traits.Amphibious: The krasis can breathe air and water.

actions.Multiattack: The krasis makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage.
